name: Learning with the PooYoos - Episode 1
description:
With the PooYoos, a merry band of adorable baby animals, children will have fun while learning the basics for his or her development: numbers, letters, space, shapes, colors and more. Children get to dance with their new friends and are offered lovely interactive rewards. With two levels of interactivity, your children can play, whatever their age and level, at activities based on magic, sky and music.

This game has been designed for use by children who have not yet grasped reading.  The instructions are spoken in English, French or Spanish.

© 2011 Lexis Numérique. All rights reserved. « PooYoos » is a trademark of Lexis Numérique.
PlayStation®Move features require PlayStation®Move motion controller and PlayStation®Eye (sold separately).
